sentences.en: " Be quiet,'she warned suddenly, grasping his arm. " Listen . Someone's down there. "
sentences.cn: “ 不要响, ” 她突然抓住他的左臂低声说, “ 听, 下面有人. ”

sentences.en: " Glad to see you,'said the latter, grasping his hand lightly.
sentences.cn: “ 很高兴见到你, " 赫斯渥和他轻轻地握了手,说道.

sentences.en: A grasping hand is forever empty. A giving hand is always full.
sentences.cn: 一支攫取的手永远是空空的, 一支给予的手永远是满满的.

sentences.en: Fleshly sense had been capable of grasping the whole.
sentences.cn: 肉体的感官能包罗全体.

sentences.en: Grasping hand is forever empty. a giving hand is always full.
sentences.cn: 一只攫取的手永远是空空的, 一只给予的手永远是满满的.

sentences.en: Grasping the measuring method of total exchange capability of acid cation resin.
sentences.cn: 掌握强酸性阳树脂总交换容量的测定方法.

sentences.en: Hanson was a hard grasping man.
sentences.cn: 汉森是个苛刻贪婪的人。

sentences.en: He is quick in grasping the gist of a book.
His mother sat on the back, grasping the rack without a sound.
sentences.cn: 母亲默默地坐在自行车后座上, 抓着车座一声不响.

sentences.en: I'm also good in boxing, thai boxing and grasping hands of martial arts!
sentences.cn: 我也精通拳击 、 泰拳、国术擒拿手!

sentences.en: Life, all cities finishing grasping myself very calm, also fine.
sentences.cn: 把握好自己的人生, 一切都会很平静, 亦美好.

sentences.en: Nuocha cried , Change and immediately he into a andarms grasping six weapons.
sentences.cn: 哪吒喝声[变], 立即变为三头六臂,手持六般兵器,扑面打来.

sentences.en: The claws of a crab are used for grasping things, especially food.
sentences.cn: 螃蟹用钳抓东西, 特别是食物.

sentences.en: The knowledge memory is temporary, thinking method grasping is permanent.
sentences.cn: 知识的记忆是暂时的, 思想方法的掌握是永久的.

sentences.en: They are all heroes grasping the nettle.
sentences.cn: 他们都是迎着艰险上的英雄.
他们贪得无厌而且喜欢摆布人。

words.tran_cn: 理解，领会（grasp的现在分词形式）；抓紧，抓牢

trans.tran_en: too eager to get money and unwilling to give any of it away or spend it

trans.tran_cn: 抓住( grasp的现在分词 )，了解，急忙抓住，急切（或贪婪）地抓住
